name: Keep the Fire
description:
Gameplay

Your objective is to make your way through the dark cave, while not allowing the flame you carry to die. Keep an eye on it as the light diminishes, because when the fire dies, it's game over. Bats accelerate the rate at which the flame burns out, and if you fall too deep in water the flame will die inmediatly.

Controls

  •  Directional arrows - Movement
  • Space - Jump

Credits

  • Programming and audio: Carlos (me)
  • Art: Valeria

Programs used

  • Godot 3 as the game engine.
  • Aseprite for art.
  • LMMS for music and SFX.
